attributes.action: Scrap the 10 Downing Street online petition system as it's a waste of public money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Surely the idea having an online petition system to gauge people's opinion on the matters of the day is to actually listen. 

So how can it be that the most subscribed petition on this website is being categorically ignored? 

"Oh, so 1.7 million of you don't want vehicle tracking and the pay per use road pricing policy? Ah, no matter, we'll just ignore you and continue regardless."

Please Mr Blair - forget about asking the great British public their opinion on anything because we all know you're too self righteous to listen.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
